scripts.coveralls: truffle run coverage && cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:js && yarn run lint:sol
scripts.lint:fix: yarn run lint:js:fix && yarn run lint:sol:fix
scripts.dist: rm -rf build && yarn truffle compile && mkdir -p dist && cp build/contracts/Mooniswap.json dist/ && cp build/contracts/MooniswapFactory.json dist/ && cp build/contracts/GovernanceMothership.json dist/ && cp build/contracts/GovernanceRewards.json dist/ && cp build/contracts/ReferralFeeReceiver.json dist/ && cp build/contracts/TokenMock.json dist/ && cp build/contracts/FarmingRewards.json dist/ && cp build/contracts/ExchangeGovernance.json dist/
scripts.flatten:mooniswap: truffle-flattener ./contracts/Mooniswap.sol |  awk '/SPDX-License-Identifier/&&c++>0 {next} 1' > ./Mooniswap.full.sol && solcjs --bin --abi --optimize ./Mooniswap.full.sol && mv ./__Mooniswap_full_sol_Mooniswap.bin ./Mooniswap.full.bin && mv ./__Mooniswap_full_sol_Mooniswap.abi ./Mooniswap.full.abi && rm ./*_sol_*
scripts.flatten:factory: truffle-flattener ./contracts/MooniFactory.sol |  awk '/SPDX-License-Identifier/&&c++>0 {next} 1' > ./MooniFactory.full.sol && solcjs --bin --abi --optimize ./MooniFactory.full.sol && mv ./__MooniFactory_full_sol_MooniFactory.bin ./MooniFactory.full.bin && mv ./__MooniFactory_full_sol_MooniFactory.abi ./MooniFactory.full.abi && rm ./*_sol_*
